subject: Re: Hello everyone !!!
author: LC Duplatt
full_text:
Hi, Ralph. Please let us know how the "puck" works for you.  :)

LC

--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "Ralph Smith" <Ralphsmi@...> wrote:
>
> Hi all,
> 
>  Ralph here again. Seems every time I come back on to leave a 
message
> there's some bickering going on. I can't leave you people for a 
minute 
> without some hoopla going on LOL (just Kidding). Well how ya'll 
doing ?
> Fine I hope. I have been busy with my Paranormal Group and 
> investigations and Gettysburg. I was in Gettysburg over this past 
> weekend and got an EVP in the Triagular Field that said " Never 
trust 
> Abe Lincoln " LOL must have been a Rebel soldier. I thought that 
was 
> pretty cool. I also got a voice whispering " Good Day " while I was 
> leaving the field. I haven't had any time to do any box research 
but I 
> just recieved a cool device created by Bill Chappel called the " 
> Paranormal Puck " can't wait to use it. It does real time voice 
> communication with phonetic speech and texting on the computer from 
> taking the surrounding ambient energies to create speech from the 
> atmosphere through the Paranormal puck that has eight sensors that 
> gathers the data and converts it to speech. I think that is an 
accurate
> description of it. 
> 
> Hey does anyone know what happened to Mike Colleta ? I haven't 
heard 
> anything from him for awhile. He hasn't updated his website and his 
> Blogtalk radio show has not been on lately either. I haven't seen 
any 
> posts on here either. So what's up with Mike I hope he's alright ? 
Just
> concerned I really liked his Blogtalk shows. 
> 
> Frank Sumption please don't let all of this bickering bother you. 
Your 
> a better person than that. Keep up what your doing. I look forward 
to 
> hearing what you have to say about your work and appreciate it 
also. 
> Ignor all the hoopla and just give us all your knowledge and 
thoughts 
> on what you love to do best and that's good enough for me and all 
> others on here that think your the best at what you do. We support 
you.
> I wish I was as one tenth as smart as you, I would be making all 
kinds 
> of gadgets believe me. I'm just a high school drop out with a GD 
from 
> the Military working in a Post office ( making some good money 
though 
> better than some College Grads) glad to say. I do have a ton of 
Ghost 
> Hunting gadgets also LOL. My group calls me " Inspector Gadget " 
LOL.
> So Frank your the reason alot of us have joined this group. So 
don't 
> be upset if some of the people get caught up in their own selves. 
Most 
> of us want you here probably all of us do. It's your choice what 
you 
> do. I can't persuade you to stay. It won't be the same if you 
leave, 
> your knowledge and you will be missed. I know I'll miss ya. Even 
> though I am not here all the time I am in the background watching 
and 
> reading all the posts. Enough of my meandering gibberish. You all 
take 
> care and I 'll let you know how the "Paranormal Puck" works out. 
> Thanks for putting up with my long post here. Take care all.
> 
> Regards,
> 
> Ralph the Ghost Hunter
> S.P.I.R.I.T Paranormal Investigation Team
> GhosttHostt
>
